channel.title: 718 farming saving

item.title: 718 farming saving
item.dc:creator: @k0ed_ur_mom k0ed ur mom
item.description:
@k0ed_ur_mom wrote:

so i figured i would make a database to save farming, i created the file and database to connect to. I have no idea how i would add it to save the patches. I have [code] public static boolean saveFarming(Player player) {//saves farming
try {
createConnection();//creates connection

       destroyConnection();
    } catch (Exception e) {
            Logger.log("Farming", "Error, could not save Farming for " + player.getUsername() +".");//couldnt save the player's Farming, it tells u it didnt on the run.bat
        return false;
    }
    return true;
}[/code]

In the space is where i have no idea what to put if someone could help me id be thankful

Read full topic
